DOC.brief_summary: The study identify healthy adult vaccinate pneumococcus , collect blood purpose develop laboratory assay .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Serum Collected From Healthy Adults For Development Pneumococcal Opsonophagocytic Assay
DOC.detailed_description: Collect serum antibody level capable kill pneumococcal bacteria healthy prevaccinated adult develop OPA assay 13 serotypes 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult 1870 year age Must receive 23vPS pneumococcal vaccine Bleeding diathesis Pregnancy Chronic disease could worsen donate blood Receipt blood , blood product immune globulin within six month
